Package com.agorapulse.gru

Interface RequestDefinitionBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WithContentSupport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRequestDefinitionBuilder
    public interface RequestDefinitionBuilder
extends WithContentSupport
    Prepares the request for controller action.

    • Method Detail

      • command

        <M extends Minion> RequestDefinitionBuilder command​(Class<M> minionType,
                                                    Command<M> command)
        See Also:
        Squad.command(Class, Command)

      • json

        RequestDefinitionBuilder json​(String relativePath)
        Sets a JSON request from given file. The file must reside in same package as the test in the directory with the same name as the test e.g. src/test/resources/org/example/foo/MySpec. The file is created automatically during first run if it does not exist yet with empty object definition. It automatically applies Content-Type: application/json header.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - a JSON request file
        Returns:
        self

      • json

        RequestDefinitionBuilder json​(Content content)
        Sets a JSON request from given content. It automatically applies Content-Type: application/json header.
        Parameters:
        content - a JSON request file
        Returns:
        self

      • json

        default RequestDefinitionBuilder json​(Map<?,​?> map)
        Sets a JSON request from given content. It automatically applies Content-Type: application/json header.
        Parameters:
        map - map to be converted to JSON
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • content

        RequestDefinitionBuilder content​(String relativePath,
                                 String contentType)
        Sets a payload for the request from given file. The file must reside in same package as the test in the directory with the same name as the test e.g. src/test/resources/org/example/foo/MySpec. The file is created automatically during first run if it does not exist yet with empty object definition. It automatically applies Content-Type header.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - relative path to the payload file for the request
        contentType - content type of the payload
        Returns:
        self

      • content

        RequestDefinitionBuilder content​(Content content,
                                 String contentType)
        Sets a request payload from given content. It automatically applies Content-Type header.
        Parameters:
        content - payload for the request
        contentType - content type of the payload
        Returns:
        self
